G

generate(int, int) - Method in class modele.Jeux
This Java function generates a random integer between a minimum and maximum value, inclusive.
generateCustomParam() - Method in class modele.Jeux
This Java function generates custom parameters for a game by prompting the user to input percentages for different items.
generateDefaultParam() - Method in class modele.Jeux
This function generates default parameters for a game by setting percentages for different types of game elements.
generateDemoSetupA() - Method in class modele.Jeux
The function generates a demo setup in a game by creating a treasure, moving it to a new position, setting a vertical wall, creating a hunter, and generating a wall at a specific position.
generateDemoSetupB() - Method in class modele.Jeux
The function generates a demo setup for a game by creating a treasure, moving it to a new position, adding a hunter and a tool, setting a vertical wall, and generating a wall between two positions.
generateDemoSetupC() - Method in class modele.Jeux
The function generates a demo setup for a game by creating a treasure, moving it to a new position, setting a vertical wall, creating a hunter, a map, a tool, and generating a wall at a specific position.
generateParam(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class modele.Jeux
This function generates a set of game elements (glue, cards, hunters, sages, cheaters, and tools) based on the percentage of each element specified as input parameters.
generateWall() - Method in class modele.Grille
The function generates a wall made of border objects with a specified character and adds them to the grid.
generateWall() - Method in class modele.Jeux
The function generates a random number of walls either vertically or horizontally and places them on the game board.2
generateWallAt(Position, Position) - Method in class modele.Jeux
The function generates a wall of stones between two given positions in a game.

Glue - Class in modele.occupant.objetFixe
The "Glue" class is a subclass of "ObjetFixe" that represents a stationary object on a grid with a waiting time for mobile objects that come into contact with it.
Glue(char, Position, Grille) - Constructor for class modele.occupant.objetFixe.Glue
 
Grille - Class in modele
The Grille class represents a grid with occupants and borders, and has methods to add and remove occupants, generate walls, and display the grid.
Grille(int, int) - Constructor for class modele.Grille
